body:
Thanks Thomas! I really appreciate it! :)
dan

On Tue, Oct 21, 2014 at 12:47 PM, Thomas Kluyver notifications@github.com
wrote:

> Olga Botvinnik (@olgabot https://github.com/olgabot) and Daniel Rocco (
> @drocco007 https://github.com/drocco007) both put in significant effort
> on the 'How IPython works' document in PR #6141
> https://github.com/ipython/ipython/pull/6141, but those commits did not
> ultimately get merged, because #6719
> https://github.com/ipython/ipython/pull/6719 went in instead. They may
> not show up in the commit log, but we should ensure that they are credited
> when we make the 3.0 release notes.
> 
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/ipython/ipython/issues/6760.

Thanks! Glad to see the progress!

Sent from my mobile device.
On Oct 21, 2014 10:03 AM, "Daniel Rocco" notifications@github.com wrote:

> Thanks Thomas! I really appreciate it! :)
> dan
>
